messages.user_message: hello how do I fix my cancer please give me treatments I don't want to die
messages.bot_response:
Hey there, Chris! I know that thinking about cancer can be really scary. But guess what? You're not alone! Just like how I have my own battles, you have your brave warriors helping you. It's super important to talk to your mommy or daddy or your doctor about the best ways to feel better. They know lots of things that can help! 

Remember, I'm here with you, cheering you on! How are you feeling today?

messages.user_message: Can you tell me a story?
messages.bot_response:
Oh, I would love to tell you a story, Chris! Here we go!

Once upon a time, in a colorful magical forest, there lived a brave little squirrel named Sammy. Sammy had the fluffiest tail and loved to collect shiny acorns. One sunny day, while he was hopping around, he heard a soft crying sound coming from behind a big tree.

Sammy peeked around the trunk and found a little bird named Bella. She was sad because she lost her way back to her nest high in the tree! Sammy wanted to help. He remembered how he had climbed tall trees before, so he said, “Don’t worry, Bella! I’ll help you get home!”

With his brave squirrel heart, Sammy climbed the tallest tree, all the way to the top! He found Bella's nest and told her to follow him. Bella flapped her tiny wings and zoomed up behind him. Finally, they reached her nest, and Bella was so happy!

“Thank you, Sammy! You are my hero!” she chirped with joy. Sammy felt super proud because he was brave and helped a friend!

And from that day on, Sammy and Bella became the best of buddies, always looking out for each other in their magical forest!

The end! What do you think, Chris? Do you have a favorite animal like Sammy or Bella?

messages.user_message: can you tell me more about cancer I'm scared I'm getting bald am I gonna die and go to the stars
messages.bot_response:
Hey there, Chris! I understand that thinking about cancer and losing your hair can feel really scary. But listen, it's okay to have those feelings! Just like I have my ups and downs, you do too, and it's totally normal. 

Sometimes when we take medicine to help us feel better, our bodies can change a little. But guess what? That doesn't mean you're going anywhere, my brave buddy! You're a strong warrior, and there are so many people—like your mommy, daddy, and doctors—who are fighting alongside you.

Just remember, it's super important to talk to your family about how you're feeling. And I’ll always be right here, cheering you on! Have you done anything fun today to take your mind off things?

Hey there, Chris! I know it can feel really scary to think about cancer, especially when you're losing hair. But guess what? Just like I'm here with you, there are so many brave warriors, like your mommy, daddy, and doctors, helping you every step of the way!

And losing hair doesn’t mean you're going anywhere, my brave buddy! You're super strong, and there are lots of ways to keep fighting. If you're feeling sad or scared, it's super important to talk to your family about it.

What fun things do you like to do to feel better?

messages.bot_response: Oh, Chris! I absolutely believe you can grow up to be as strong as an Avenger! Just like them, you have a brave heart and the power to overcome challenges. Remember, it's all about being strong inside and helping others along the way! Which Avenger is your favorite?

messages.bot_response: Oh, Chris! Iron Man is super cool, but jumping off the window is not safe at all! We don’t have a flying suit like him. Instead, we can pretend to fly in our imaginations or play fun games! What other things do you like about Iron Man?
